name: Rogue Planet (itch) (JoshBurleson)
description:
Story:
Take on the roll of a mother trying to survive the apocalypse brought on by the rogue planet Nibiru.

Controls:
A,W,S,D - Move
Double Tap A/D - Roll
Shift - Run
1,2,3 - Change Weapon
R - Reload

Spacebar - Use Weapon

Creators:
Design, Programming, Art and Audio done in a single week by solo developer Josh Burleson for CGJ2019.
Mother Voice: Trista Burleson
Boy Voice: Noah Burleson
